# Rethinking Intelligence

> A site dedicated to promoting understanding of artificial intelligence, written by Robert Todd — a learning-technology pioneer based in San Francisco, CA.

The site helps people understand and collaborate with machine intelligence. It covers AI's impact on work, learning, society, and how to think critically about the technology shaping our world.

## Pages

- [About](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/about/): About this site and its mission.
- [Understanding AI (Resources)](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/resources/): Curated resources to build understanding of machine and human intelligence.
- [Working with AI](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/working/): Links to AI tools and results of experiments working with LLMs.
- [Teaching about AI](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/teaching/): Information about talks and teaching on living and working with machine intelligence.
- [Experiments](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/experiments/): Hands-on experiments with AI tools and models.

## Posts

- [Will AI Augment or Replace Human Labor?](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/blog/2025/03/05/AI-impact-on-labor-demand.html)
- [Why Write? Skills in the Age of AI](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/a-world-with-ai/2025/03/05/why-write.html)
- [Learning Is Not What You Think — Unpacking Humanity's Superpower](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/blog/2025/03/15/learning-is-more.html)
- [The Profit-Value Disconnect](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/blog/2025/03/31/The-Profit-Value-Disconnect.html)
- [How AI Impacts Teams](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/article/2025/04/02/ai-impact-on-teams-mollick.html)
- [The Escalating Cost of Carelessness](https://rethinkingintelligence.ai/blog/2025/04/22/The-Escalating-Cost-of-Carelessness.html)
